SEARCH
Package com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.dao.impl

Class ProjectDao

java.lang.Object
com.masri.TaskMangamentSystem.dao.impl.ProjectDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudDao<Project>
@Repository public class ProjectDao extends Object implements CrudDao<Project>
Implementation of the CrudDao interface for managing Project entities.

This class provides methods for basic CRUD operations and additional queries specific to the Project entity.

Author:
ahmad almasri

    • getProjectWithItsTaskAndUsersById

      public Project getProjectWithItsTaskAndUsersById(int id)
      Retrieves a Project entity along with its associated tasks and users by its ID.

      This method uses a join fetch to eagerly load the project's tasks and users.

      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the project to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The project entity with its associated tasks and users.
